title: [Moonstone Abbey, Crystal Lake]
description: A grove of linden trees grows almost to the banks of a large, pristine lake, its waters a shade of blue usually reserved for only the most beautiful of sapphires.  Here and there, drifts of fog rise from the mirror-smooth surface like wraiths twirling in a slow-motion dance.  Due north, on the lake's distant shore, stands an unusual building.  Three towers flank the domed structure, and drifting fog girds its striking configuration like a robe of mystery.

A grove of linden trees grows almost to the banks of a large, pristine lake, its dark waters reflecting the moon like a perfect twin living within the depths.  Here and there, drifts of fog rise from the mirror-smooth surface like wraiths twirling in a slow-motion dance.  Due north, on the lake's distant shore, stands an unusual building.  Three towers flank the domed structure, and drifting fog girds its striking configuration like a robe of mystery.

A large pristine lake, bordered by a grove of linden trees growing almost to its banks, displays the reflected moon in the sky like a perfect twin living within its depths.  A wooden fishing dock juts out over the lake, and drifts of fog rise from the mirror-smooth surface of the water like wraiths twirling in a slow-motion dance.  On the lake's distant shore stands an unusual building.  Three towers flank the domed structure, and drifting fog girds its striking configuration like a robe of mystery.
